CompositionReservation.description: The CompositionReservation schema contains reservation information related to the Compose action defined in the CompositionService resource when the of RequestType parameter contains the value `PreviewReserve`.
CompositionReservation.longDescription: This resource represents the composition reservation of the composition service for a Redfish implementation.

title: #CompositionReservation.CompositionReservation
